Title: XSS vulnerability in bookmarks
Description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ownCloud before 4.5.5 and 4.0.10 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the PATH data to index.php in apps/bookmark/
Resolution: It is recommended that all instances are upgraded to ownCloud Server 4.5.5 or 4.0.10.
